attributes.review: Hi, so I was really looking forward to downloading this app but what I found was EXTREMELY disappointing✨. The app was extremely glitchy and had negative content towards people of color.Also, for some reason I kept seeing a lot of images of deformed oranges✨🧚✨. I would appreciate if this app where taken down immediately. Thank you✨🧚✨.
attributes.title: Orange Highlighter✨🧚🧚✨

attributes.review: First of all this app was so slow and so glitchy omg I bout threw my phone across the room second it asks for personal that I did not want to give out and third as soon as I got logged in a porn hub ad popped up, which was by far disgusting 💔🤢🤮 and plus it asks for my location like I was not gonna give that out! once I had everything settled down it asks for my credit card info... well my my stupid butt put my info in and now I get charged $99 a month 🙄DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! IT IS A SCAM!!
attributes.title: THIS IS DISGUSTING

attributes.review: IT MADE ME POOP MY PANTS
attributes.title: stinky

attributes.review: So while I was just scrolling on TikTok and watching hunterxhunter an add for this app popped Up and ofc me being the person who ✨totally ✨loves our 🍊wonderful non racist or homophobic president 🍊decided to download it but my phone went boom and hisoka went ohhhhhhhhHhHhH goOoOoOoOoOn and I went 🤯😡😳😭because so many things had just happened but then hisoka made this very angry face 😠 so I decided he was hungry and threw goldfish at my computer screen,he was still angry 😤 but then I realized the app was still on my phone so I took what remained of my phone 💥 and burned it even more,then popped it in my blender to make a smoothie.Once the smoothie was done I put it in my ✨🧚‍♀️least🧚‍♀️✨favorite cup went to turn on the news,but didn’t forget to pop up a picture of hisoka,gave a bit of the smoothie to hisoka he was very happy but he was still saying ooOoOOoOHhhHhH GooOoOoOoN 😳💅but besides that the point is this app actually made me make something for hisoka who is my secondl least favorite person on this planet he’s behind u guessed it 🍊✨🧚‍♀️😡trump🍊✨🧚‍♀️😡
attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME MAKE SOMETHING FOR HISOKA🤢🤮😡👁👄👁😳💅

It took soooo long for the app to turn on and when it did.HORRIBLE,DISGUSTING.

It’s a no from me.
